name: Queen's Impling

triggers.description: Deal [effect0.power] damage to the front enemy unit.

characterLoreTooltips: In these dreams, the Shardtail has shown me the result of her Exodus: the first cycling imps in the Scorched Plains. I've never encountered these sharded imps in Hell, but their resemblence to those I have met is uncanny. Perhaps these dreams are something more...
